task.title: Set up the floor stand
task.shortdesc: Six simple steps to setup the floorstand for use with the Valusinâ„¢ 10" ring light.

info.p: Twist the lock to release the base of the tripod. A hand is shown twisting the lock to release the base of the floor stand.

step.cmd: Adjust the base height and lock it in place.

info.p: Adjust the base to the preferred height, and then twist the lock to secure the stand. One hand is holding the base of the floor stand while the other hand twists the screw to lock the base in place.

step.cmd: Release tabs to lengthen the floor stand.

info.p: Release the tabs to lengthen the floor stand pole to the preferred height. One hand is holding the base of the floor stand while the other hand releases the tabs to lengthen the floor stand.

step.cmd: Press tabs to secure the pole in place.

info.p: Once the floor stand is at the desired length, press the tabs to lock the floor stand pole in place. A hand is shown pressing the tabs to secure the pole of the floor stand after adjusting the length.

step.cmd: Attach the ring light to the floor stand.

info.p: Align the ring light and the screw on top of the floor stand then turn the gear at the top of the floor stand to tighten the screw.

image.alt: One hand is shown holding the top of the floor stand while the other hand aligns the ring light at the top.
A hand is shown twisting the gear to secure the light to the floor stand.
Complete floor stand at full heigh with ring light and phone attached.
